Lists.Tactical Formations:
Tactical Formations

Unlocked at Reputation Level I. Additional formations at Rep II, III, IV.

Initiating a Tactical Formation

  • At round start, squadron agrees to initiate
  • All Magi-Knights may trade Initiative slots; Squadron Leader must act first
  • At Squadron Leader's turn start: If 3+ Magi-Knights within Formation Range (60ft), initiate
  • Pay Formation Cost immediately (any participant may contribute Inspiration)
  • Bonuses activate immediately
Alternative Payment: 2 Exhaustion Points instead of 1 Inspiration (1 Exhaustion if Leadership Proficient)

Bond Requirement: Without Friendly Bond or higher with each participant, take 1 Stress per Magi-Knight with New Beginning or lower bond at end of turn

Formation Loss: At end of any turn, if 2 or fewer Magi-Knights in Formation Range, formation is lost. Exposed/Unconscious Magi-Knights are immediately removed.

Lists.Combination Maneuvers:
Combination Maneuvers

Unlocked at Reputation Level II. Requires Unity Points (gained at Rep II, III, IV, V).

Unity Points

  • Maximum = Reputation Level - 1
  • Restored by Refreshing Sleep Effect or certain Shards
  • Excess Unity Points convert to Inspiration Points

    • Initiating a Combination Maneuver

    Step 1: Check for Participants

  • Requires 2+ Magi-Knights
  • Cannot include Restrained, Exposed, or Unconscious
  • Without Caring Bond or higher with all participants: Must spend 1 Inspiration to join

    • Step 2: Choose Initiator and Finisher

  • All involved may switch Initiative Order
  • Initiator must act first among participants
  • Finisher must act last among participants

    • Step 3: Group Up!

  • At Combo Initiator's turn start: Free Action Leadership DC 12
  • On success: All participants beyond 10ft may Move toward Initiator (doesn't Provoke)
  • Immediate Action + 1 Exhaustion: Additional Move toward Initiator

    • Step 4: Charge Up!

  • All participants do "Prepare For a Combo" Action
  • Action cost varies by Combo type

    • Step 5: Finish the Combo!

  • Finisher uses Full-Round Action
  • All participants pay full Unity Cost
  • Effects activate

    • Step 6: Check for Additional Effects

  • Maneuver Tax: All involved make Mysticism (CON; DC 14). Fail = 1 Exhaustion
  • Quick Combos: Only need Steps 1, 5, 6
  • Lingering Effects: Persist until Exposed, Unconscious, or combat ends
  • Legendary Combos: Ringshine Fulmination requires secret Herald quest

Lists.Squadron Formation Mastery:
Squadron Formation Mastery

Social Tactic (6th+ Level)

Reduce Inspiration Point cost for Tactical Formations you participate in by 1 (minimum 1).

---
Lists.Combination Maneuver Mastery:
Combination Maneuver Mastery

Battle Technique (6th+)

Before rolling for the Maneuver Tax of a Combination Maneuver, you automatically pass your test and can negate the failed result of one other squad member.

---
Lists.Synchronized Formation:
Synchronized Formation

Social Tactic

If you have Friendly Bond or higher with every Magi-Knight in a Tactical Formation, you no longer take Stress from bond penalties during the formation.
